OOC: Actually, its another not submerged cave...

Bic: Meteara steps out of the icy water and scans the road from there. 
She turns to Firaxis.

Meteara: The sphere is over there. It will be safer for us to travel 
in beast mode from now on. Energon affects me even if I do not possess 
a spark.

She transforms and waits for Firaxis.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Very good.  Give the man a cigar.  well no don't tobacco is 
nasty... but 
> i shouldn't say that too loud  too many tobacco farms in this town.
> 
> ::Firaxis::
>        He followed her, nodding at what she said.  He followed her 
into the 
> tunnel and upwards toward the fresh air.
